designs.title: Adam
designs.keywords: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
designs.description: Greyscale. The first of men, and the culprits of original sin. The rosework took about 2 hours.

designs.title: Yggdrasil
designs.keywords: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
designs.description: THe tree of life in Nordic mythology, the branches of Yggdrasil extend far into the heavens, and the tree is supported by three roots that extend far away into other locations; one to the well Urðarbrunnr in the heavens, one to the spring Hvergelmir, and another to the well Mímisbrunnr. Creatures live within Yggdrasil, including the wyrm (dragon) Níðhöggr, an unnamed eagle, and the stags Dáinn, Dvalinn, Duneyrr and Duraþrór.

designs.title: Wolf
designs.keywords: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
designs.description: Made upon request, this wolf concept took about 1 hour to sketch out. Since the client chose another piece, this design is half price.

designs.title: Angels and Deamon
designs.keywords: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
designs.description: Black and white concept. It can be made in to color upon request. Took about 4 hours and you can have it for about 400 bucks. The design is part of my good versus evil campaign.

designs.title: Skull Candy
designs.keywords: A little desctiption goes in here, cuz its just a desctiption.
designs.description: Designed for a lovely lady, this candy skull  with flowers were a dedication to her father. Took approx 3 hrs to sketch up and 2 sittings to ink inn.
